text: The Peugeot 607 is a full-size executive car produced by the French automaker Peugeot from 1999 to 2011. Designed to replace the Peugeot 605, the 607 was part of Peugeot's efforts to enter the premium segment and compete with established rivals like the Audi A6, BMW 5 Series, and Mercedes-Benz E-Class. The car featured a high level of luxury for its time. It was produced in sedan form and was offered with a range of engines, including both petrol and diesel options. In 2011, the Peugeot 607 was replaced by the Peugeot 508. == Engines == * 2.0 100 kW (136 hp) * 2.2 116 kW (158 hp) and 120 kW (163 hp) * 3.0 152 kW (207 hp) and 155 kW (211 hp) * 2.0 HDi 79 kW (107 hp), 80 kW (109 hp) and 100 kW (136 hp) * 2.2 HDi 98 kW (133 hp) and 125 kW (170 hp) * 2.7 HDi 150 kW (204 hp) ==References== ==Other websites== * https://www.carthrottle.com/features/peugeot-607-pescarolo-could-have-been- frances-bmw-m5 607 Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Peugeot 607
